Sentencas: A novel hydrostatic pressing system was used to assess the sintering performance of BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-delta (BZY15) and help densify the BZY15 pellets.
Titulo: A detailed study of hydrostatic press, sintering aids and temperature on the densification behavior of Ba(Zr,Y)O3-d electrolyte

Sentencas: The influence of the pressing pressure in a range of 350-600 MPa was assessed in terms of final density after sintering.
Titulo: A detailed study of hydrostatic press, sintering aids and temperature on the densification behavior of Ba(Zr,Y)O3-d electrolyte

Sentencas: The experiments were executed in single phased BZY15 and with the addition of CeO2, NiO and ZnO as sintering aids.
Titulo: A detailed study of hydrostatic press, sintering aids and temperature on the densification behavior of Ba(Zr,Y)O3-d electrolyte

Sentencas: Microstructural analysis was performed to evaluate the morphology of the grains and porosity.
Titulo: A detailed study of hydrostatic press, sintering aids and temperature on the densification behavior of Ba(Zr,Y)O3-d electrolyte

Sentencas: Results showed that NiO and ZnO are the best sintering aids with densification above 95% under sintering at 1400 degrees C. Grain size evolution was analyzed by microstructural analysis.
Titulo: A detailed study of hydrostatic press, sintering aids and temperature on the densification behavior of Ba(Zr,Y)O3-d electrolyte

Sentencas: Electrochemical behavior was analysed by impedance using symmetrical cells.
Titulo: A detailed study of hydrostatic press, sintering aids and temperature on the densification behavior of Ba(Zr,Y)O3-d electrolyte
